column3: I'm fine with removing 'new'. See Marco's answer about removing\n'experimental'.\n
@paveljanik @sipa Ok, thanks for the feedback and apologies for missing the previous discussion. I've updated this PR accordingly to align it with your comments.\n
Yes, leave experimental, agree on removing new (although both are subjective and relative - bitcoin is still a lot newer than say, the use of debt-backed bank notes).\n
